function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of citizen engagement in smart city initiatives","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Provincialization of smart city in south africa and india","category":"Society","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Global distribution of research team","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of smart city technologies with pandemic response","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 disease in healthcare sectors","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in implementing 5g technologies for healthcare","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Re-emergence of covid-19 due to relaxed control mechanisms","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper handling of sensitive personal data in remote monitoring and contact tracing solutions.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Delay or prevention of timely healthcare access due to technical solutions.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Legal issues arising from the complex environment of 5g-enabled smart devices for e-health.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conspiracy linking 5g and covid-19 leading to disrupted connectivity","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Technical literacy requirement for 5g solutions","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Resistance and deterrence of health personnel from using new e-health systems","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited deployment of 5g networks and limited availability of 5g devices","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complexity and implementation issues of 5g devices, including power consumption and multi-band support","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incidents of destroying cellular base stations due to conspiracy theories linking 5g networks and the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased network congestion due to rapid deployment of new healthcare applications and increased number of 5g users","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in managing billions of miots generating ad hoc data transfers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited connectivity challenges in 5g deployment","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Adversaries attacking databases with sensitive information pose security risks.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Integration of miot increases security risks of healthcare systems, making them vulnerable to dos attacks.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Massive connected devices increase the attack surface for unauthorized operations on the healthcare system.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Personal information disclosed in telemedicine sessions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Automated contact tracing applications aggregating sensitive location data without user consent","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and transparency about data sharing and privacy risks in e-health technology","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases due to inadequate monitoring and compliance of self-isolation.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy protection issues related to the collection and transfer of sensitive health data via wearable devices and cloud networks.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Scalability and resource demand challenges for 5g-enabled healthcare applications, including contact tracing and monitoring.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Manual contact tracing is ineffective in identifying all possible close contacts, hindering the effectiveness of contact tracing.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pure gps-based contact tracing solutions lack the accuracy to identify close contacts within a few meters.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Delivery of items via beyond line-of-sight blos uav may lead to technological failures or errors, increasing the risk of delayed or inaccurate deliveries.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Mobile device-based self-isolation monitoring may be susceptible to data breaches, compromising the privacy and security of the individuals’ location and health information.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uav-based monitoring of covid-19 patients may raise concerns regarding personal privacy and consent for data collection and surveillance.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortage of raw materials and labor force disrupts regular production","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Imbalance of supply for essential goods like n95 masks and hand sanitizers","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Delivery concerns due to covid-19 spread and physical contact restrictions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on 5g for hosting network functions may increase the risk of spreading contagious diseases if the network is not adequately secured or maintained.","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Imbalance in the supply chain for healthcare products such as ppe, ventilators, and drugs could lead to shortages, increasing the risk of healthcare workers and patients being exposed to contagious diseases.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collection of covid-19 patient data from different healthcare centers","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Making covid-19 patient data available to the public","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Live video conferencing for healthcare professionals and patients","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases through shared healthcare environments.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ultra-dense small cell networks may facilitate the spread of contagious diseases in indoor environments.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High data rates for a large number of served users may lead to overcrowding in indoor environments, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of resources in healthcare facilities due to existing covid-19 patients","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Strict requirements and sophisticated underlying technologies for teleservices","category":"Structures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Need to minimize the risk of healthcare professionals getting exposed to covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases due to increased use of remote healthcare services telehealth .","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in managing the implementation of 5g technologies for healthcare use cases.","category":"Structures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The reliance on technological advancements may lead to the neglect of basic public health measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"}]}
